contents.text: Thank you for calling RazorFrog in San Francisco, where we craft beautiful and functional WordPress websites.
For new project inquiries and consultations, press 1.
To speak with our sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: Discuss pricing and timeline for a new WordPress site with sales
I need to speak with sales about building a new WordPress site for my veteran support nonprofit.
I want to get a quote from the sales team on building a headless WordPress site with GraphQL API.
I need to talk to someone about launching a new WordPress site and get a price estimate.
I’d like to get pricing details for developing a WordPress site for my physics research portfolio.

contents.text: To schedule a project consultation, press 2.
Please hold while we help schedule your consultation. We will be right with you.

navigationGoals: Book a consultation slot for my upcoming website project
I’d like to schedule a consultation to plan and scope my upcoming website project.
I want to schedule a technical consultation to discuss custom Gutenberg block development.
I want to book a meeting to plan my website’s features and timeline.
I’d like to arrange a consultation to plan a WordPress site for my university physics project.

contents.text: For existing client support and maintenance, press 2.
For technical support on your WordPress site, press 1.
Please hold for technical support. Our WordPress experts will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a plugin issue on my existing WordPress site
I’m an existing client and need technical support fixing a plugin issue on my site.
I want support troubleshooting a PHP fatal error after my last plugin update.
I’m having technical issues with my existing WordPress site and need help fixing them.
I need assistance troubleshooting a plugin error on my existing WordPress site.

contents.text: For billing questions and account information, press 2.
Please hold for billing and account services. A representative will be with you soon.

navigationGoals: Clarify charges and due date on my latest invoice
I have a question about my recent invoice and need billing assistance for my maintenance plan.
I want to update my billing information for the monthly maintenance invoice.
I have a question about my invoice and need to update my payment information.
I have a question regarding my recent invoice for website maintenance services.
